title: All-MLB Team Ballot logo is updated to show 2021
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot logo
custom_expected: Then it is updated to 2021

title: About the Ballot
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user selects 'About the Ballot'
custom_expected: Then the user is displayed the 2021 'About the Ballot' text.

title: Ballot - EspaÃ±ol
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot (ENG) - https://www.mlb.com/all-mlb/ballot/
custom_steps: When the user selects 'EspaÃ±ol'
custom_expected: Then the user is brought to the Spanish Language Ballot (https://www.mlb.com/es/all-mlb/ballot)

title: Official sponsor of the All-MLB Team Ballot shows as Cue Health
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When viewing the sponsor of the 2021 ballot
custom_expected: Then the sponsor of the 2021 ballot is Cue Health

title: Official title shows: VOTE: 2021 All-MLB Team
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When viewing the official title
custom_expected: Then the official title shows VOTE: 2021 All-MLB Team

title: Captcha is required prior to submission
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When attempting to submit the ballot without the required Captcha
custom_expected: Then the user is unable to submit the ballot

title: All-MLB Team Ballot is responsive in all viewports and devices
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When viewing the ballot on any device in any viewport
custom_expected: Then the ballot is fully responsive

title: All-MLB Team Ballot is accessible on standard web platforms
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When using accessibility features on standard web platforms
custom_expected: Then All-MLB Team Ballot is accessible on standard web platforms

title: User can select one player per position (1B, 2B, SS, 3B, C, DH), up to three players for OF, up to five players for Starting Pitcher, up to two players for Relief Pitcher.
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is selecting players
custom_expected: Then the user can select one player per position (1B, 2B, SS, 3B, C, DH), up to three players for OF, up to five players for Starting Pitcher, up to two players for Relief Pitcher.

title: User must submit at least one player to submit the ballot
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When attempting to submit the ballot
custom_expected: Then the user must submit at least one player to submit the ballot

title: User can vote up to 1 times per day (reset 11:59pm local time)
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When user votes up to 5 times per day (reset 11:59pm local time)
custom_expected: Then the user is not allowed to vote again until 12:00 am the next day when it resets

title: Registration: Email address shows as a required field
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the required registration fields
custom_expected: Then  Email address shows as a required field

title: Registration: Date of Birth shows as a required field
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the required registration fields
custom_expected: Then DoB shows as a required field

title: Registration: Zip/Postal Code shows as a required field
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the required registration fields
custom_expected: Then Zip/Postal Code shows as a required field

title: Registration: Country of Origin shows as a required field
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the required registration fields
custom_expected: Then Country of Origin shows as a required field

title: Registration: reCAPTCHA is enabled and must be satisfied prior to submission of the vote.
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is completes the required registration fields, and satisfies the reCAPTCHA requirements.
custom_expected: Then the "Submit Your Vote" is enabled and clickable.

title: 728x90 ad is served on Review page (Desktop)
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is on the Review page
custom_expected: Then the 728x90 ad is served

title: Primary Vote users under the age of 13 will be redirected to a coppa page
custom_preconds: GIVEN user enters a date of birth for 13 year old or under
custom_steps: When the user clicks submit, they will be given error message. When trying to reload the ballot homepage, user will be redirected to COPPA page
custom_expected: Then the user is brought to the Ineligible page: https://www.mlb.com/official-information/ineligible

title: User can select none and up to the max players per position.
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is selecting players
custom_expected: Then the Number of players(s) out of the total max players allowed to be selected is correctly displayed.  (e.g. 1 of 1 player selected)

title:
Page renders in Appview:
https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/app/atbat/all-mlb/ballot?appState=live

custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the appview version of the All-MLB Ballot page from a mobile device: 

https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/app/atbat/es/all-mlb/ballot?appState=live
https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/app/ballpark/es/all-mlb/ballot?appState=live
https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/app/ballpark/all-mlb/ballot?appState=live
https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/app/atbat/all-mlb/ballot?appState=live
custom_expected: Then the page renders without the header and footer.

title: Verify Basebal Stats API Endpoint
custom_preconds: Given the tester is viewing the baseball stats api endpoint
custom_steps: When viewing the bdata stats api endpoint for the All-MLB Team Ballot: <<Insert bdata stats API endpoint here>>
custom_expected: Then the list of players for each position shown on the front-end web app matches the players listed in the endpoint.

title: Verify Players and their Positions
custom_preconds: Given the tester is viewing the All-MLB team Ballot page.
custom_steps: When viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot voting page
custom_expected: Then list of players and their assigned positions matches the latest player list provided by Product.

title: Native Mobile App / Web View Verification
custom_preconds: Given the user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot from an Mobile Device (Android and Apple).
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot from either within an article or from the MLB App menu.
custom_expected: Then the All-MLB Team app is displayed as expected

title: Ad Skins
custom_preconds: Given the tester is viewing the All-MLB team Ballot page.
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the ALl-MLB Team Ballot page with adskins being served.
custom_expected: Then the adskins are displayed and clicking on the adskins will take the user to the expected URL.

title: All-MLB Team Ballot pre-state (ENG) relevant link shows: https://www.mlb.com/all-mlb/ballot?appState=pre
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the ENG ballot Pre-State
custom_expected: Then the relevant link shows: https://www.mlb.com/all-mlb/ballot?appState=pre with information on when voting opens.

title: All-MLB Team Ballot (ENG) live-state relevant link shows: https://www.mlb.com/all-mlb/ballot?appState=live
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the ENG ballot Live State
custom_expected: Then the relevant link shows: https://www.mlb.com/all-mlb/ballot?appState=live

title: All-MLB Team Ballot (ENG) post-state relevant link shows: https://www.mlb.com/all-mlb/ballot?appState=post
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the ENG ballot Post-State
custom_expected: Then the relevant link shows: https://www.mlb.com/all-mlb/ballot?appState=post with language stating that "Voting for the 2021 All-MLB Team is now complete"

title: All-MLB Team Ballot pre-state (ES) relevant link shows: https://www.mlb.com/es/all-mlb/ballot?appState=pre
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the ES ballot Pre-State
custom_expected: Then the relevant link shows: https://www.mlb.com/es/all-mlb/ballot?appState=pre with information on when voting opens.

title: All-MLB Team Ballot (ES) live-state relevant link shows: https://www.mlb.com/es/all-mlb/ballot?appState=live
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the ES ballot Live State
custom_expected: Then the relevant link shows: https://www.mlb.com/es/all-mlb/ballot?appState=live

title: All-MLB Team Ballot (ES) post-state relevant link shows: https://www.mlb.com/es/all-mlb/ballot?appState=post
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the ES ballot Post-State
custom_expected: Then the relevant link shows: https://www.mlb.com/es/all-mlb/ballot?appState=post with language stating that "Voting for the 2021 All-MLB Team is now complete"

title: Confirmation Emails
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user votes for the first time
custom_expected: Then users receive one vote confirmation email (per email) regardless of what ballot (language) they vote from

title: User can review each of the All-MLB Team player selections
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user successfully submits the ballot and is brought to the review page: https://www.mlb.com/all-mlb/ballot/review
custom_expected: Then the user can review each of the All-MLB Team player selections

title: After voting for the desired players, the user can review picks
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is finished selecting players
custom_expected: Then the user can move on to the Review Page by selecting the Review Picks button.

title: Players voted for appear on a playercard at their position
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user has successfully submitted the ballot
custom_expected: Then Players voted for appear on a playercard at their position

title: User can share their ballot selections via social media (Twitter)
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user has successfully submitted a ballot and when attempting to Twitter social share on the thank you page
custom_expected: Then the user can share their ballot selections via social media (Twitter)

title: User can share their ballot selections via social media (Facebook)
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user has successfully submitted a ballot and when attempting to Facebook social share on the thank you page
custom_expected: Then the user can share their ballot selections via social media (Facebook)

title: Users can share their ballot selections via Save Image
custom_preconds:
Given the user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot (EN and ES)
And is submitting a vote
custom_steps: When the user has successfully submitted a ballot
custom_expected: Then the user is provided the ability to select the button "Save Image", a Ballot card image is generated and downloaded/opened in a new window.

title: When revisiting the ballot after submitting ballot, previous submissions are auto populated
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When the user has successfully submitted a ballot and revisits the ballot after ending session
custom_expected: Then previously submitted players are selected

title: After clearing browser's cookies player selections are cleared
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When user clears the browser's cookies
custom_expected: Then all player selections are cleared

title: User can Edit Selections from the Thank You Page
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot Thank You Page
custom_steps: When user selects the "Edit Selections" link/button.
custom_expected: Then the user is brought back to the voting page to change player vote selections.

title: MLB User Account login
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot Thank You Page.
custom_steps: When the user completes a ballot submission and  is already logged into his/her account.
custom_expected: The account login is not presented on the Thank You Page.

title: MLB User Account login
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the All-MLB Team Ballot Thank You Page.
custom_steps: When the user completes a ballot submission and is not logged into his/her account.
custom_expected: The account login is presented on the Thank You Page.

title: Player position is "Active" when selected and when the user scrolls through the positions.
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG All-MLB Team Ballot
custom_steps: When selecting player positions.
custom_expected: Then the player positions become "active" and highlighted in blue.
